item.title: Version 0.9.8.8
item.description:
Feed Customization & Settings:

  • Create your perfect information feed with new customization settings
  • Control what appears in your upcoming feed with easy toggles
  • Configure your experience with comprehensive settings panel
  • Customize your agent persona to match your personal style

Improved App Experience:

  • Automatic app update checks every 3 hours
  • Refreshed loading window for a smoother startup experience
  • Feed automatically updates after contact sync

Bug Fixes & Improvements:

  • Fixed issues with undo functionality
  • Improved enrichment logs for better tracking
  • Resolved agent persona update issues
  • Fixed field pack structure and added missing columns
  • Corrected copy functionality to ensure data integrity
